description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; on the right side of the image a man in a black coat and hat walks on a street with buildings behind him; he has his hands in his coat pockets
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: II Probedruck. E.60-II | LR of sheet, in pencil: 2. Zustand. | LR of sheet in pencil, on verso: Für [illegible] / 12. Juin 20 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: #1942
portfolio: From Plate 6 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18. | LL in pencil, below image: Zu Gogol : der Mantel.
title: Akaki Wears the Coat for the First Time on the Street, Plate 6 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
